name: Ginger
description: Ginger is a flowering plant whose rhizome is widely used as a spice and folk medicine.
usage: Can be consumed fresh, dried, as tea, or in capsules.

name: Chamomile
description: Chamomile is an herb that comes from the daisy-like flowers of the Asteraceae plant family.
usage: Typically brewed as tea or used in essential oils.

name: Red Raspberry Leaf
description: Leaves from the raspberry plant used in herbal medicine.

name: Echinacea
description: A group of flowering plants used to boost the immune system.

name: Garlic
description: A plant in the onion family used for flavoring and medicine.

name: Peppermint
description: A hybrid mint used for its cooling effect.

name: Dandelion
description: A common weed with medicinal properties.

name: Lemon Balm
description: A herb in the mint family with a lemon scent.

name: Fenugreek
description: An herb used in cooking and medicine.

name: Cranberry
description: A berry used for urinary health.
